Class vimdaloo.version.NvimVersion ¶

Class Hierarchy
  • vimdaloo.lang.Object
  •  └─ vimdaloo.version.Version
  •        └─ vimdaloo.version.SemanticVersion
  •              └─ vimdaloo.version.NvimVersion

Description ¶

A semantic version populated from Neovim

-- SemanticVersion parent class gets populated from:
--   io.popen(vim.v.progpath .. ' -v')

-- NvimVersion class gets further populated from:
--   vim.version()
--     NVIM v0.7.0
       {
         api_compatible = 0,
         api_level = 9,
         api_prerelease = false,
         major = 0,
         minor = 7,
         patch = 0
       }
--     NVIM v0.8.0-dev+302-gaf2899aee
       {
         api_compatible = 0,
         api_level = 10,
         api_prerelease = true,
         major = 0,
         minor = 8,
         patch = 0,
         prerelease = true
       }
